snippet: The father-and-son team behind a money market fund that nearly took down the economy can breathe a sigh of relief. | Goldman Sachs is set to announce its new partners. | Another insider trading trial gets under way. | Comparing J.C. Penney to Apple...
abstract: The father-and-son team behind a money market fund that nearly took down the economy can breathe a sigh of relief. | Goldman Sachs is set to announce its new partners. | Another insider trading trial gets under way. | Comparing J.C. Penney to Apple makes little sense, Andrew Ross Sorkin writes.

headline.main: Money Market Pioneer Cleared of Fraud
